en.title: FE Officiates Opening of Quantum Boba Restaurant, Ho Chi Minh City, 19th April 2009!
en.content:
FE is proud to officiate the opening of the Quantum Boba Restaurant in Ho Chi Minh City on 19th April 2009. The opening was attended by FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting, Founder Director KS Lee, Vietnam Country Licensee Doan Nguyen, FE Spokesman Master Yap together with many leaders from Malaysia, including PD's KC Phoon, Paul and Doris Lee, Allan Yeo and Goh Thian Chai. FE believes that this is the world's FIRST restaurant that uses scalar energized water for all their food and drinks. It was exciting to see the looks on the patron's faces when FE leaders performed demonstration on them after they had a drink of coffee at the opening! Amazing, they all said! Congratulations to FE's new Vietnamese Leader and CEO of Quantum Boba Restaurant, Mr Tran Van Vinh for being a Pioneer! We believe this concept will catch on and grow around the world. 

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
